content:
RegistryValueOptions Enum

Definition

Specifies optional behavior when retrieving name/value pairs from a registry key.

In this Article

[System.Flags]
public enum RegistryValueOptions
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
RegistryValueOptions

Remarks

Use the DoNotExpandEnvironmentNames flag with the Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.GetValue(String,Object,RegistryValueOptions) method overload.

Fields

DoNotExpandEnvironmentNames

A value of type crosoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind.ExpandString is retrieved without expanding its embedded environment variables.
None

No optional behavior is specified.
